article_title: Open & Shut: Circle of business life
article_text:
By Times-News

Posted Jun. 28, 2015 at 4:16 PM

Updated Jun 29, 2015 at 7:14 AM

article_metadata.description: A new beard-care business starts, a theater changes hands and a chain store closes taking its Burlington location with it.
